alert.note: Alert for Osage; Shawnee; Wabaunsee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 17 at 10:03PM CDT until May 17 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT FOR SHAWNEE...EASTERN WABAUNSEE AND NORTHERN OSAGE COUNTIES... At 1002 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles west of Meriden to near Auburn, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Topeka, Carbondale, Rossville, Tecumseh, Richland, Dover, Silver Lake, Auburn, Overbrook, Burlingame, Scranton, Maple Hill, Harveyville, Willard, Pauline, Keene and Berryton. At 956 PM...A trained spotter reported 60 MPH winds 7 miles south- southeast of Silver Lake. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 between mile markers 341 and 355. Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 155 and 188. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
